input.description: XML Sample of Items for the wrapper: <items> <item> <command>add</command> <category>configuration</category> <category-type>schedule</category-type> <command-arguments> <schedule-name>"Schedule Name"</schedule-name> <description>"Schedule Description"</description> <nextrun-date>2008-07-22</nextrun-date> <nextrun-time>10:00</nextrun-time> <interval-frequency>2</interval-frequency> <interval-duration>day</interval-duration> <discoverygroup-ids>cxws,Default</discoverygroup-ids> <infrastructure /> <backup /> <refresh /> <enable /> </command-arguments> </item> <item> <command>add</command> <category>configuration</category> <category-type>schedule</category-type> <command-arguments> <schedule-name>"Schedule Name"</schedule-name> <description>"Schedule Description"</description> <nextrun-date>2008-07-22</nextrun-date> <nextrun-time>10:00</nextrun-time> <interval-frequency>2</interval-frequency> <interval-duration>day</interval-duration> <discoverygroup-ids>cxws,Default</discoverygroup-ids> <infrastructure /> <backup /> <refresh /> <enable /> </command-arguments> </item> </items>

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <request-data> <scom-request> <operation-name> <xsl:value-of select="//operation-name" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </operation-name> <xsl:for-each select="//items/item"> <command-request> <timeout-secs> <xsl:value-of select="./timeout-secs" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </timeout-secs> <command-parameters> <xsl:copy-of select="./command-parameters/*" /> </command-parameters> </command-request> </xsl:for-each> </scom-request> </request-data> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>
